column5: went to the outdoor world spring sale at the baltimore maryland store sunday morning with my son-in-law. got there about 5 minutes before opening and got a few bargains. shopping was ok for about the first 1 1/2 hours. after that you literally could not maneuver through the aisles. guess cabin fever and being cooped by our massive snowstorms had taken over. we just got out of there. glad we went early. cannot wait for this weather to break.
yes they have one by us at gurnee mills. now thats a real outdoor store. those fish in the tank look like they would be fun to catch.
